General.Name: Chongqing Wangbian Electric (Group) Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: Chongqing Wangbian Electric (Group) Corp., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of power transmission and distribution and control equipment, and oriented silicon steel products in China. It offers power transformers, box-type substations, and sets of electrical equipment for use in agriculture, industry, and commerce, as well as residential electricity applications; and general oriented silicon steel and high magnetic induction oriented silicon steel for use as raw materials for the production of transformers and various motors. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Chongqing, China.
